outline:
1. to put, set
    1. (Qal)
      1. to put, lay (hand upon)
      2. to set, station, appoint, fix, set mind to
      3. to constitute, make (one something), make like, perform
      4. to take one's stand
      5. to lay waste
    2. (Hophal) to be imposed, be set upon
kjv_def: apply, appoint, array, bring, consider, lay (up), let alone, [idiom] look, make, mark, put (on), [phrase] regard, set, shew, be stayed, [idiom] take.
strongs_def: to place (in a very wide application)
